alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch; Coffee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 9:46AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coffee, Atkinson and northwestern Clinch Counties through 1045 AM EST... At 945 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers and strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Poulan to near Moultrie. Movement was east at 45 mph. This line will reach these counties around 1030 AM. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Pearson, Willacoochee, Broxton, Ambrose, Nicholls, West Green and Axson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
